Data & Information for LMSP

Data and Information Resources for LMSP

Comprehensive data and information portal to support Local Marine Spatial Planning implementation across Tanzania.

Key Data Categories

1. Marine Resources Data

Essential baseline information on marine resources:

  • Fisheries Data
    • Production by species and area
    • Distribution patterns
    • Seasonal dynamics
    • Catch composition
  • Biodiversity Information
    • Species distributions
    • Critical habitats
    • Protected areas
    • Ecosystem services
  • Oceanographic Data
    • Current systems
    • Temperature and salinity patterns
    • Seasonal variations
    • Climate indicators

Access Marine Resources Data

2. Socio-Economic Data

Information on coastal communities and livelihoods:

  • Population & Demographics
    • Coastal population distribution
    • Demographic profiles
    • Growth trends
    • Vulnerable populations
  • Livelihood Information
    • Fishing communities
    • Tourism operators
    • Aquaculture practitioners
    • Other marine resource users
  • Economic Data
    • Revenue from marine activities
    • Employment patterns
    • Poverty indicators
    • Economic dependencies

Access Socio-Economic Data

3. Infrastructure & Use Data

Mapping of marine uses and infrastructure:

  • Maritime Infrastructure
    • Ports and harbors
    • Landing sites
    • Shipping routes
    • Coastal development
  • Marine Activities
    • Fishing zones
    • Tourism areas
    • Aquaculture sites
    • Conservation areas
  • Conflict Areas
    • Overlapping uses
    • Access disputes
    • Management challenges

Access Infrastructure & Use Data

4. Environmental & Climate Data

Monitoring climate and environmental conditions:

  • Climate Indicators
    • Sea level rise projections
    • Temperature trends
    • Storm frequency
    • Seasonal patterns
  • Environmental Quality
    • Water quality parameters
    • Pollution sources
    • Coastal erosion
    • Habitat degradation
  • Vulnerability Assessments
    • Climate vulnerability
    • Community exposure
    • Adaptive capacity

Access Environmental Data

Data Access Platforms

Interactive Maps

Explore spatial data through interactive mapping tools: - Marine resource distributions - Protected areas - Fishing zones - Infrastructure locations - Vulnerability hotspots

Open Interactive Maps

Data Download Center

Access raw datasets for analysis:

  • GIS shapefiles and layers
  • Statistical databases
  • Reports and publications
  • Monitoring data
  • Research findings

Browse Available Datasets

Data Standards & Documentation

Ensuring quality and usability:

  • Data metadata documentation
  • Quality assurance guidelines
  • Data use protocols
  • Citation standards
  • Confidentiality agreements

View Data Standards

Data Contribution

Have data to contribute?

We welcome contributions from: - Research institutions - Government agencies - Community organizations - Private sector partners - Individual researchers

Submit Data: data@lmsp-tanzania.example.com

Include: - Dataset description - Data collection methodology - Coverage area and period - Format and specifications - Relevant documentation

Data Use Agreement

Users of LMSP data agree to:

✓ Use data only for authorized purposes
✓ Maintain confidentiality of sensitive data
✓ Provide appropriate attribution
✓ Share derived findings with the community
✓ Report any data quality issues

Support & Questions

Need help accessing or interpreting data?

Contact our Data Team: data-support@lmsp-tanzania.example.com
